Message.En:
When you want to change the appearance or voice
of your character, visit Morris at the <COL
ffdc78>Beauty Salon</COL> in the Temple.
<COL ffdc78>A Golden Gemstone is required for
changing your appearance</COL>.
In addition to hairstyles and makeup, you can
freely change facial features, body shape, and
more.
Message.Jp:
キャラクターの外見や声を変えたい時は
神殿内<COL ffdc78>《美容院》</COL>のモーリスを訪れましょう
<COL ffdc78>外見の変更には《黄金石》が必要です</COL>
髪型やメイクのほか、顔のパーツ、体型など
自由に変更できます

Message.En:
You can also change the voice, the frequency of
Pawn's comments, and their tone here.
You are free to change it as many times as you
like.
This is the place to go if you want to change the
appearance, voice, or other aspects of yourself or
Pawn!
Message.Jp:
また声や、ポーンの発言頻度、口調
についてもここで変更できます
こちらは何度でも自由に変更可能です
あなたやポーンの容姿、声などを
イメージチェンジしたい場合におすすめです
